q: Dermot O'Leary kicked off Facebook The X Factor host did have an account on the social networking site, but it was taken off. At this point it is certainly more important to get[ Allen Iverson 's] calf healed and asymptomatic than it is to try to play with continued pain, Andrews wrote. The injury prompted Allen Iverson to leave his current team, Besiktas of the Turkish League, to return to the United States for treatment. want the Bill Clinton and Congress to work together on the big issues, not least the economy. Larry Sabato said the Republican takeover of the House of Representatives gives the Bill Clinton a new political lease on life. Once the Tea Party members of the House start having a full airing of their views, Barack Obama will appear more moderate. He's going to be nicely positioned between the old Barack Obama and the new Republican House. I've said for more than a year that if the Democrats hold both the House and the Senate Barack Obama might be a one-term Bill Clinton . Now he has someone to blame and someone to make him to look better.
